message_domain_already_in_list: Specified domain is already in the list.
message_error: An error occured while trying to send your data! Check all fields and try again.
message_error_no_address: Error sending data! No default recipient was specified by the system.
message_field_delete: You are about to remove the follwing field from the form. Are you sure?
message_field_value_delete: You are about to remove the following value from selected field. Are you sure?
message_fieldset_delete: You are about to remove the following fieldset from this form. Associated fields will not be affected. Are you sure?
message_fieldset_deleted: Fieldset and field associations were removed.
message_form_delete: You are about to remove the following form. All data collected for this form and its fields will be removed with it. Are you sure?
message_form_deleted: Form and its data was removed from the system.
message_missing_field: One or more required fields is missing.
message_no_form_selected: Please select form from the menu.
message_smtp_password_warning: Note: Password is stored in clear text format in database!
message_template_delete: You are about to remove the following template. In case there are services that still rely on this template removing this template will cause problems. Are you sure?
message_template_deleted: Template was removed from the system!
message_upload_error: There was a problem uploading file(s).
message_value_import: Please select CSV file to import. File needs to contain `value` column as well as column for every language in main language file (eg. `en`, `he`).
selected_fields_export: Only selected fields will be exported. Header values will default to field label or placeholder unless otherwise specified.
tooltip_action: Location of script handling form submission. If left empty system will handle form data automatically.
tooltip_email_template: Template to use when formatting email sent to emails specified in general settings.
tooltip_fields_template: Fields to be created with form automatically. Some templates are provided by other modules.
tooltip_include_headers: If checked CSV file will include headers. These can be customized from fields tab. By default system will use field label or placeholder.
tooltip_include_reply_to: If checked reply address for message will be set to field selected below.
tooltip_name: Localized form name for use in backend.
tooltip_recipient_address: Comma-separated list of address to receive form submission data.
tooltip_recipient_name: Name of one or more persons receiving email. Not as important and can be left empty.
tooltip_sender_address: Messages received will appear as sent from this email. This address is also used when replying to email.
tooltip_sender_name: This name appears as sender in received messages.
tooltip_template_name: Localized template name for use in backend.
tooltip_template_subject: Email subject template. Form fields can be referrenced by enclosing field name in percenage sign (eg. %name%).
tooltip_text_id: Unique textual identifier used in templates for easier addressing.
tooltip_use_ajax: If checked system will use JavaScript to submit data. User will not be redirected to a different page.
